amendment.description: An amendment numbered 64 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit federal funds to pay the salary of, reinstate, or reemploy Robert Malley.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 188 (Roll no. 319).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 188 (Roll no. 319).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
